backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing admin export/import features, referenced files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including styles, config, storage, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables for light/dark modes plus global styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app routing between public viewer and admin area using tabs and catalog state.
Admin container showing storage notice, data transfer tools, banner manager, upload form, and catalog manager.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBanne: Admin tool to upload, validate, preview, and remove a 1280x720 banner image with LocalStorage sync.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCatal: Admin table listing catalog items with remove actions and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDataT: Provides UI for exporting and importing app data with confirmation dialogs and file handling.
Implements an admin login gate with credential checking and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUploa: Form for adding catalog items with fields for title, label, media type, and media source validation.
frontend/src/components/layout/Backgroun: Renders a fixed background image with a gradient overlay.
frontend/src/components/layout/MasparLay: Page layout with header, background, footer, and social links wrapping all site content.
frontend/src/components/public/Collectio: Displays selectable collection cards showing icon, name, and item count.
Shows catalog items in a grid with media-type icons, thumbnails, and click handling.
frontend/src/components/public/PublicVie: Main public catalog view with search, filtering, banner display, item grid, and media modal.
frontend/src/components/public/SearchAnd: Renders a search bar and label filter dropdown with thumbnails for filtering items.
frontend/src/components/viewers/ImageZoo: Provides zoom and rotation controls for viewing an image with adjustable scaling.
frontend/src/components/viewers/MediaVie: Modal viewer that displays images, videos, or PDFs with validation and content protection.
frontend/src/components/viewers/PdfFirst: Embeds the first page of a PDF via iframe and shows an error state on load failure.
frontend/src/components/viewers/VideoVie: Plays a video with controls and shows an error message if the source fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and tracks a backend actor using the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalog.ts: Loads, cleans, seeds, and manages a catalog with add/remove operations and cross-tab syncing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout functions, and loads saved identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, themes, and utility classes including glass effects and content protection.
frontend/src/lib/adminAuth.ts: Implements simple admin auth with hardcoded credentials and localStorage-based unlock state.
frontend/src/lib/bannerStorage.ts: Manages banner data in localStorage with load, save, clear, and cross-tab sync via custom events.
frontend/src/lib/catalogStorage.ts: Handles catalog persistence with sanitization, migration, and change broadcasting across tabs.
frontend/src/lib/catalogTypes.ts: Defines catalog item and media type interfaces, including a relaxed type for stored items.
frontend/src/lib/collections.ts: Provides default collections and returns active ones based on catalog content.
frontend/src/lib/contentProtection.ts: Disables context menu and drag actions on elements to prevent content copying.
frontend/src/lib/dataTransfer.ts: Implements catalog/banner export, import, validation, and item sanitization for data transfer.
frontend/src/lib/labelLanguage.ts: Empty placeholder file for label language handling.
frontend/src/lib/labelThumbnails.ts: Maps predefined labels to thumbnail paths and exposes lookup helpers.
frontend/src/lib/predefinedLabels.ts: Defines the fixed list of valid labels and utilities to check label validity.
frontend/src/lib/seedCatalog.ts: Exports an empty seed catalog and lists deprecated seed IDs and titles for cleanup.
frontend/src/lib/uiText.ts: Centralized UI text strings for headers, navigation, admin UI, public UI, and footer.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and authentication provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with theme extensions, plugins, and custom colors.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for a mobile‑responsive Maspar sales portal using HTML/CSS/JS with LocalStorage. Serves as the central specification for UI theme updates, login rules, content handling, and pending fixes.
